trans-unit.source: The MsmqIntegrationSecurity class encapsulates the transport security settings for the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration channel.
trans-unit.target: De klasse MsmqIntegrationSecurity kapselt de beveiligingsinstellingen voor transport voor het integratiekanaal Message Queuing (MSMQ).

trans-unit.source: The Message Queuing integration channel enables [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] applications to communicate with existing Message Queuing applications.
trans-unit.target: De Message Queuing-integratiekanaal kan [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] toepassingen om te communiceren met de bestaande Message Queuing-toepassingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"></xref> that is associated with the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration channel.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"> </xref> dat is gekoppeld aan het integratiekanaal Message Queuing (MSMQ)-.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode> is an enumeration that contains the following values: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode>is een opsomming met de volgende waarden: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode>en <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode></xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"></xref> that is associated with the Message Queuing integration channel.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"> </xref> dat is gekoppeld aan de integratie van Message Queuing-kanaal.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> that is associated with the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration channel.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"> </xref> dat is gekoppeld aan het integratiekanaal Message Queuing (MSMQ)-.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity> encapsulates the security settings for the Message Queuing integration transport.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity>de beveiligingsinstellingen voor de integratie van Message Queuing-transport ingekapseld.</xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity>

trans-unit.source: The settings are the same for both the Message Queuing integration and queued transports.
trans-unit.target: De instellingen zijn hetzelfde voor de Message Queuing-integratie en in de wachtrij transporten.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity> enables you to set the Authentication Mode, Encryption Algorithm, Secure Hash Algorithm, and Protection Level.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity>Hiermee kunt u de verificatiemodus, versleutelingsalgoritme, Secure Hash Algorithm en beveiligingsniveau ingesteld.</xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> that is associated with the Message Queuing integration channel.
trans-unit.target: De <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"> </xref> dat is gekoppeld aan de integratie van Message Queuing-kanaal.
